infobox.Japanese title:: 水族館のある家  (Suizokukan no aru Ie)
infobox.Cast:: Conan Edogawa  Hiroshi Agasa  Ai Haibara  Detective Boys  Juzo Megure  Wataru Takagi  Officer Tome
infobox.Character design:: Masatomo Sudo  Seiji Muta (sub-character)  Kumiko Shishido (design works)
infobox.Voice Cast::
Voice Cast:



Minami Takayama as Conan Edogawa  Kenichi Ogata as Hiroshi Agasa  Yukiko Iwai as Ayumi Yoshida  Wataru Takagi as Genta Kojima, Wataru Takagi  Ikue Otani as Mitsuhiko Tsuburaya  Megumi Hayashibara as Ai Haibara  Chafurin as Juzo Megure  Toshihiko Nakajima as Officer Tome  Nobuo Tobita as Kosuke Imura

sections.Situation:
Professor Agasa takes Conan, Haibara, and the Detective Boys to the house of a famous aquarium designer, Nishida. Kosuke Imura lets them into Nishida's home when Nishida does not answer the door. The Detective Boys find Nishida drowned in his bathtub.

The police determine that Nishida died the night two days prior and from falling asleep in his bathtub due to alcohol consumption. Conan disproves the theory explaining that the bathroom light was not on when they found him. The police investigate Imura's alibi which confirmed he was in Guam for the past two days at a shooting range.
sections.People:
- 32 years old
- Satoshi's assistant
- Victim (drowned)
- Aquarium designer
- Agasa's friend
